content.body: in the document at https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#introduction-to-the-dom aren’t there in fact two newlines at the end of the body element?
the spec shows it as having a single newline, but if you inspect the actual DOM or serialize it, I think you’ll find two newlines there, right?

> <@sideshowbarker:mozilla.org> the spec shows it as having a single newline, but if you inspect the actual DOM or serialize it, I think you’ll find two newlines there, right?

I only see one:
